title: Flower Power (Miss Spider)
features: Little buggies Honey Bee and Li’l Sis are tired of being treated like babies, but Squirt, Shimmer, and Dragon won’t let them play any bigbug games. When Li’l Sis gets lost in the meadow, Honey Bee shows the kids that sometimes it takes a little bug to be a big hero.
description: David Kirk lives in upstate New York.
